attr.title: Shin Fangame Tensei
attr.desc: Build a team of demons and summon the right party to defeat your enemies. Each demon has a unique set of skills that determine their behavior in battle, so carefully consider their positioning as to not waste their talents, or worse .... If your team sucks, you can fuse your demons to make stronger ones, but even weak demons will shine with proper tactics. Enemies grow stronger as the FULL MOON approaches, and something awaits beyond that ...
attr.inst: Download SFT.zip from itch.io (https://jab-lao.itch.io/shin-fangame-tensei) and extract the contents to this port's gamedata folder
